node.title: VTuber Design Book at Comiket 100 Sold Out
node.description: The 100th edition of Japan\'s popular Comic Market (Comiket) happened just last weekend, and among the various books sold at the fan event of the summer is a **VTuber Design Book** featuring more than 800 assets for various VTuber activities created by 98 designers.
